description:
While heading to Asatsuki Town for Hikari`s next contest, Satoshi and his friends got lost once again in a forest. They see Grandma Tatsu`s Altaria`s Draco Meteor in the air and quickly go to see where it was coming from.
Grandma Wilma introduces herself to the group. Grandma Wilma is based off the Route 210 Dragon type Pokémon tutor who teaches Draco Meteor to trainers Pokémon. A Gible appeared on the field as Altaria was practicing and tried to use Draco Meteor as well. It had a hard time getting the move to work properly and it kept hitting Hikari`s Pochama.
After leaving Grandma Tatsu, Gible followed Satoshi and his friends and Satoshi later captured it after a battle with his rival Jun.
name: Fukamaru (Satoshi)
